languages.text: {n}Вы едва узнаете в жалкой согбенной фигуре Абеляра Версериана, вашего верного сенешаля. Офицерская выправка, развернутые плечи, пронзительный прямой взгляд — все это пропало без следа. Перед вами — дряхлый трясущийся старик, который перебирает зловонные отбросы и бормочет себе под нос.{/n}

{n}You barely recognise your loyal Seneschal, Abelard Werserian, in this pitiful, hunchbacked figure. His officer's bearing, his broad shoulders, his direct and piercing gaze — all gone without a trace. What you see before you is a decrepit, quivering old man rummaging through malodorous refuse and mumbling under his breath.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы едва узнаете в жалкой согбенной фигуре Абеляра Версериана, вашего верного сенешаля. Офицерская выправка, развернутые плечи, пронзительный прямой взгляд — все это пропало без следа. Перед вами — дряхлый трясущийся старик, который перебирает зловонные отбросы и бормочет себе под нос.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can barely recognise your loyal Seneschal, Abelard Werserian, in this pitiful, slumped figure. His officer's bearing, his broad shoulders, his direct and piercing gaze — all gone without a trace. What you see before you is a decrepit, quivering old man rummaging through malodorous refuse and mumbling under his breath.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルド・ウェルザリアン家令長は、猫背の哀れな姿となり、昔の面影はほとんどない。士官としての風格、拾い肩幅、率直で鋭いまなざし…すべてが跡形もなく消え失せている。目の前にいるのは、悪臭のするゴミをあさりながら小声でつぶやく、老いさらばえた震える老人である。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise your loyal Seneschal, Abelard Werserian, in this pitiful, hunchbacked figure. His officer's bearing, his broad shoulders, his direct and piercing gaze — all gone without a trace. What you see before you is a decrepit, quivering old man rummaging through malodorous refuse and mumbling under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルド・ウェルザリアン家令長は、猫背の哀れな姿となり、昔の面影はほとんどない。士官としての風格、拾い肩幅、率直で鋭いまなざし…すべてが跡形もなく消え失せている。目の前にいるのは、悪臭のするゴミをあさりながら小声でつぶやく、老いさらばえた震える老人である。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你眼前的这个驼背的可怜老人，几乎已经没有一丝阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领的影子。他原本军官的风度，宽阔的肩膀，还有直率而锐利的目光，此刻消失得无影无踪。你只看到了一个浑身颤抖、老态龙钟的老头子，在恶臭的垃圾堆中翻找些什么，口中喃喃自语。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise your loyal Seneschal, Abelard Werserian, in this pitiful, hunchbacked figure. His officer's bearing, his broad shoulders, his direct and piercing gaze — all gone without a trace. What you see before you is a decrepit, quivering old man rummaging through malodorous refuse and mumbling under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你眼前的这个驼背的可怜老人，几乎已经没有一丝阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领的影子。他原本军官的风度，宽阔的肩膀，还有直率而锐利的目光，此刻消失得无影无踪。你只看到了一个浑身颤抖、老态龙钟的老头子，在恶臭的垃圾堆中翻找些什么，口中喃喃自语。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Apenas reconoces a tu leal Senescal, Abelard Werserian, en esta figura jorobada. Su porte de oficial, sus hombros anchos, su mirada directa y penetrante... todo ha desaparecido sin dejar rastro. Lo que ves ante ti es un viejo decrépito y tembloroso que rebusca entre la basura y murmura en voz baja.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise your loyal Seneschal, Abelard Werserian, in this pitiful, hunchbacked figure. His officer's bearing, his broad shoulders, his direct and piercing gaze — all gone without a trace. What you see before you is a decrepit, quivering old man rummaging through malodorous refuse and mumbling under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apenas puedes reconocer a tu leal Senescal, Abelard Werserian, en esta figura jorobada. Su porte de oficial, sus hombros anchos, su mirada directa y penetrante... todo ha desaparecido sin dejar rastro. Lo que ves ante ti es un viejo decrépito y tembloroso que rebusca entre la basura y murmura en voz baja.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du kannst in dieser erbärmlichen, buckeligen Gestalt kaum deinen treuen Truchsess Abelard Werserian erkennen. Seine militärische Haltung, seine breiten Schultern, sein direkter, bohrender Blick — alles spurlos verschwunden. Was du vor dir siehst, ist ein gebrechlicher, zitternder alter Mann, der stinkenden Abfall durchwühlt und wirr vor sich hinmurmelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise your loyal Seneschal, Abelard Werserian, in this pitiful, hunchbacked figure. His officer's bearing, his broad shoulders, his direct and piercing gaze — all gone without a trace. What you see before you is a decrepit, quivering old man rummaging through malodorous refuse and mumbling under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kannst in dieser erbärmlichen, buckeligen Gestalt kaum deinen treuen Truchsess Abelard Werserian erkennen. Seine militärische Haltung, seine breiten Schultern, sein direkter, bohrender Blick — alles spurlos verschwunden. Was du vor dir siehst, ist ein gebrechlicher, zitternder alter Mann, der stinkenden Abfall durchwühlt und wirr vor sich hinmurmelt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous reconnaissez à peine votre loyal sénéchal, Abélard Werserian, dans la silhouette voûtée devant vous. Sa prestance d'officier, ses larges épaules, son regard perçant... Tout a disparu sans laisser de trace. Ne reste plus devant vous qu'un vieillard décrépit et tremblant qui furète dans un tas d'ordures malodorant tout en marmonnant dans sa barbe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise your loyal Seneschal, Abelard Werserian, in this pitiful, hunchbacked figure. His officer's bearing, his broad shoulders, his direct and piercing gaze — all gone without a trace. What you see before you is a decrepit, quivering old man rummaging through malodorous refuse and mumbling under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous reconnaissez à peine votre loyal sénéchal, Abélard Werserian, dans la silhouette voûtée face à vous. Sa prestance d'officier, ses larges épaules, son regard perçant... Tout a disparu sans laisser de trace. Ne reste plus devant vous qu'un vieillard décrépit et tremblant qui furète dans un tas d'ordures malodorant tout en marmonnant dans sa barbe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sadık Seneşal'in Abelard Werserian'ın bu acınası, kambur hâlini tanımakta güçlük çekiyorsun. Bir subaya yaraşır duruşu, geniş omuzları ve kararlı, delici bakışlarından geriye hiçbir iz kalmamış. Harap hâlde tir tir titreyen ihtiyar, karşında bir şeyler mırıldanarak leş kokulu çöpleri karıştırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You barely recognise your loyal Seneschal, Abelard Werserian, in this pitiful, hunchbacked figure. His officer's bearing, his broad shoulders, his direct and piercing gaze — all gone without a trace. What you see before you is a decrepit, quivering old man rummaging through malodorous refuse and mumbling under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sadık Seneşal'in Abelard Werserian'ın bu acınası, kambur hâlini tanımakta güçlük çekiyorsun. Bir subaya yaraşır duruşu, geniş omuzları ve de kararlı ve delici bakışlarından geriye iz bile kalmamış. Harap hâlde tir tir titreyen ihtiyar, karşında bir şeyler mırıldanarak leş kokulu çöpleri karıştırıyor.{/n}
